definitions.definition: A ruminant , of the genus Giraffa , of the African savannah with long legs and highly elongated neck, which make it the tallest living animal; yellow fur patterned with dark spots, often in the form of a network ; and two or more short, skin-covered horns, so-called; strictly speaking the horn-like projections are ossicones .

main_definition: A ruminant , of the genus Giraffa , of the African savannah with long legs and highly elongated neck, which make it the tallest living animal; yellow fur patterned with dark spots, often in the form of a network ; and two or more short, skin-covered horns, so-called; strictly speaking the horn-like projections are ossicones .
secondary_definitions: ( Internet slang , uncommon ) A very tall individual .
